verses.verse: Now after<WH310> these<WH428> things,<WH1697> in the reign<WH4438> of Artaxerxes<WH783> king<WH4428> of Persia,<WH6539> [there went up] Ezra<WH5830> son<WH1121> of Seraiah,<WH8304> son<WH1121> of Azariah,<WH5838> son<WH1121> of Hilkiah,<WH2518>
son<WH1121> of Shallum,<WH7967> son<WH1121> of Zadok,<WH6659> son<WH1121> of Ahitub,<WH285>
son<WH1121> of Amariah,<WH568> son<WH1121> of Azariah,<WH5838> son<WH1121> of Meraioth,<WH4812>
son<WH1121> of Zerahiah,<WH2228> son<WH1121> of Uzzi,<WH5813> son<WH1121> of Bukki,<WH1231>

For on the first<WH259> of the first<WH7223> month<WH2320> he began<WH3246> to go<WH4609> up from Babylon;<WH894> and on the first<WH259> of the fifth<WH2549> month<WH2320> he came<WH935> to Jerusalem,<WH3389> because the good<WH2896> hand<WH3027> of his God<WH430> [was] upon him.

For Ezra<WH5830> had set<WH3559> his heart<WH3824> to study<WH1875> the law<WH8451> of the Lord,<WH3068> and to practice<WH6213> [it,] and to teach<WH3925> [His] statutes<WH2706> and ordinances<WH4941> in Israel.<WH3478>

Now this<WH2088> is the copy<WH6572> of the decree<WH5406> which<WH834> King<WH4428> Artaxerxes<WH783> gave<WH5414> to Ezra<WH5830> the priest,<WH3548> the scribe,<WH9373> learned<WH9373> in the words<WH1697> of the commandments<WH4687> of the Lord<WH3068> and His statutes<WH2706> to Israel: <WH3478>

"Artaxerxes,<WH9035> king<WH4430> of kings,<WH4430> to Ezra<WH5831> the priest,<WH3549> the scribe<WH5613> of the law<WH1882> of the God<WH426> of heaven,<WH8065> perfect<WH1585> [peace.] And now<WH3706>

I have issued<WH7761> a decree<WH2942> that any<WH3606> of the people<WH5972> of Israel<WH3479> and their priests<WH3549> and the Levites<WH3879> in my kingdom<WH4437> who<WH1768> are willing<WH5069> to go<WH1981> to Jerusalem,<WH3390> may go<WH1981> with you.

"Forasmuch<WH3606> <WH6903> <WH1768> as you are sent<WH7972> by the king<WH4430> and his seven<WH7655> counselors<WH3272> to inquire<WH1240> concerning<WH5922> Judah<WH3061> and Jerusalem<WH3390> according to the law<WH1882> of your God<WH426> which<WH1768> is in your hand,<WH3028>

and to bring<WH2987> the silver<WH3702> and gold,<WH1722> which<WH1768> the king<WH4430> and his counselors<WH3272> have freely<WH5069> offered<WH5069> to the God<WH426> of Israel,<WH3479> whose<WH1768> dwelling<WH4907> is in Jerusalem,<WH3390>

with all<WH3606> the silver<WH3702> and gold<WH1722> which<WH1768> you shall find<WH7912> in the whole<WH3606> province<WH4083> of Babylon,<WH895> along<WH5973> with the freewill<WH5069> offering<WH5069> of the people<WH5972> and of the priests,<WH3549> who offered<WH5069> willingly<WH5069> for the house<WH1005> of their God<WH426> which<WH1768> is in Jerusalem;<WH3390>

with this<WH1836> money,<WH3702> therefore<WH3606>,<WH6903> <WH1836> you shall diligently<WH629> buy<WH7066> bulls,<WH8450> rams,<WH1798> and lambs,<WH563> with their grain offerings<WH4504> and their libations<WH5261> and offer<WH7127> them on the altar<WH4056> of the house<WH1005> of your God<WH426> which<WH1768> is in Jerusalem.<WH3390>

"And whatever<WH4101> <WH1768> seems<WH3190> good<WH3191> to you and to your brothers<WH252> to do with the rest<WH7606> of the silver<WH3702> and gold,<WH1722> you may do<WH5648> according to the will<WH9568> of your God.<WH426>

"Also the utensils<WH3984> which<WH1768> are given<WH3052> to you for the service<WH6402> of the house<WH1005> of your God,<WH426> deliver<WH8000> in full<WH8000> before<WH6925> the God<WH426> of Jerusalem.<WH3390>

"And the rest<WH7606> of the needs<WH9179> for the house<WH1005> of your God,<WH426> for which<WH1768> you may have<WH5308> occasion<WH5308> to provide,<WH5415> provide<WH5415> [for it] from the royal<WH4430> treasury.<WH1596>

"And I, even I King<WH4430> Artaxerxes,<WH9035> issue<WH7761> a decree<WH2942> to all<WH3606> the treasurers<WH1490> who<WH1768> are [in the provinces] beyond<WH5675> the River,<WH5103> that whatever<WH3606> <WH1768> Ezra<WH5831> the priest,<WH3549> the scribe<WH5613> of the law<WH1882> of the God<WH426> of heaven,<WH8065> may require<WH7593> of you, it shall be done<WH5648> diligently,<WH629>
[even] up to<WH100> talents<WH3604> of silver,<WH3702> 100 kors<WH9222> of wheat,<WH2591> 100 baths<WH1325> of wine,<WH2562> 100 baths<WH1325> of oil,<WH4887> and salt<WH4416> as needed.<WH3792>

"Whatever<WH3606> <WH1768> is commanded<WH4481> <WH2942> by the God<WH426> of heaven,<WH8065> let it be done<WH5648> with zeal<WH149> for the house<WH1005> of the God<WH426> of heaven,<WH8065> lest<WH1768> there be wrath<WH7109> against<WH5922> the kingdom<WH4437> of the king<WH4430> and his sons.<WH1123>

"We also inform<WH3046> you that it is not allowed<WH7990> to impose<WH7412> tax,<WH4061> tribute<WH4061> or toll<WH1983> [on] any<WH3606> of the priests,<WH3549> Levites,<WH3879> singers,<WH2171> doorkeepers,<WH8652> Nethinim,<WH5412> or servants<WH6399> of this<WH1836> house<WH1005> of God.<WH426>

"And you, Ezra,<WH5831> according to the wisdom<WH2452> of your God<WH426> which<WH1768> is in your hand,<WH3028> appoint<WH4483> magistrates<WH8200> and judges<WH1782> that they may judge<WH1934> <WH1778> all<WH3606> the people<WH5972> who<WH1768> are in [the province] beyond<WH5675> the River,<WH5103> [even] all<WH3606> those who know<WH3046> the laws<WH1882> of your God;<WH426> and you may teach<WH3046> anyone who<WH1768> is ignorant<WH3809> <WH3046> [of them.]

"And whoever<WH3605> will not observe<WH5648> the law<WH1882> of your God<WH426> and the law<WH1882> of the king,<WH4430> let judgment<WH1780> be executed<WH5648> upon him strictly,<WH629> whether<WH2006> for death<WH4193> or<WH2006> for banishment<WH8332> or<WH2006> for confiscation<WH6065> of goods<WH5232> or for imprisonment.<WH613>"

Blessed<WH1288> be the Lord,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of our fathers, who<WH1> has put<WH834> [such a thing] as this<WH5414> in the king's heart,<WH2088> to adorn<WH3820> the house<WH6286> of the Lord<WH1004> which<WH3068> is in Jerusalem,<WH834>

and has extended<WH5186> lovingkindness<WH2617> to me before<WH6440> the king<WH4428> and his counselors<WH3289> and before all<WH3605> the king's mighty<WH1368> princes.<WH8269> Thus I was strengthened<WH2388> according to the hand<WH3027> of the Lord<WH3068> my God<WH430> upon me, and I gathered<WH6908> leading<WH7218> men<WH7218> from Israel<WH3478> to go<WH5927> up with me.
